entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 11:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -32.9°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
